description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Female field hockey elite carried out second world championships in West Berlin; foreign correspondents visit the State of Lower Saxony; a new branch of industrial science; Ergonomie is the study of adapting work to meet human needs; new mirror telescope being manufactured in Oberkochen; Cologne rates as the city with the most citizen initiative with 40 groups participating in decisions; 17th German Choir Festival in West Berlin.
